Subject: Re: Escape (Double... rescue?-> MAximals, Predacons, MEgatron and Kestral)
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=Jo-pbxsF_8nhY8_r5-9v_znYOt3SQaM7gXC2M9VAHaLjkFnmy5wZ
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

Azure transformed into the tall and dignified robot mode he bore like
a glove. Of course, he recognized the name of Megatron. Had he any
relation with this one?

Azure: Hydras, please! This violence is not going to lead you
anywhere! Your threats have to be subtler yet more dangerous at the
same time. Allow me...

He turned at Inferno and grabbed him with a solid and unwavering grasp.

Azure: Call him "queen" again and I'll implant the tiniest but most
painful energon crystal right in the middle of your spark. Got it?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras shooted as advice some inches over Inferno's head "FIRST OF
ALL"SHouted angry"DON'T CALL ME QUEEN!!!! SECOND NOW MY NAME IS
HYDRAS!!!!!"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: CatMaster o 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, June 20, 2005 5:49 PM
>   Subject: Re: Escape (Double... rescue?-> MAximals, Predacons,
MEgatron and Kestral)
> 
> 
>   After a long walk the trio arrived at the Predacon base.
> 
>   "Hey boss, we got a visitor.  We'll bring 'em to the bridge to meet 
>   ya'"  Quickstrike sent in a com to Megatron.
> 
>   Inferno lead the way through the main door and to the bridge.
>   "And at last here we are, to meet the glorious ruler of our glorious 
>   colony.  All hail Queen Megatron!"  Inferno proclaimed opening to 
>   door to the bridge.
